name: Fresh Fig and Date Shake
description: Many of us who frequent farmers’ markets this time of year bring home far more figs than we need. This thick, date-sweetened smoothie is a great way to get rid of the extras.
keywords: dates, figs, orange juice, healthy, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: A few fig slices for the glass

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients except the sliced fig in the blender. Blend until frothy, about one minute. Pour into a glass, garnish with fig slices, and serve at once.
